review_body: I didn’t expect too much and mainly booked this as I wanted an Accor hotel near Darling Harbour (we’re Accor Plus members). I was actually really impressed! The lady on check-in was very friendly and helpful with our booking as it was a bit complicated because we had a second room for family on our booking, who were then staying on longer than us. She totally understood, and provided excellent service, with a smile!The room was huge, we were upgraded to one with two big windows overlooking Darling Harbour! It had a lounge and table too, and the bathroom was surprisingly modern. We were given a bottle of red wine as well as our usual two welcome drinks from the bar!The main bar area and restaurant were huge and had great views of Darling Harbour, a nice vibe at sunset too with happy hour. The only negatives were: - Huge rooms but only a Queen sized bed, it felt so small when we’re used to a King at home. - The water pressure in the shower was terrible, it was like a drizzle at best. Thank you for a great stay, highly recommend!

review_body: We had booked into the Ibis on Darling Harbour for a two night stay and when we arrived we had been Upgraded to the Novotel next door. What a wonderful surprise. We had the best time. Used the Light Rail to get around to the Lyric Theatre at the Casino to see Muriel's Wedding, The Musical. Fantastic show, enjoyed it so much, it's all about Australians in the 21st Century. Also used the Ferry to get to Circular Quay, great trip. The Hotel had the best breakfast and very comfortable. So easy to get around Sydney from Darling Harbour. We had an interconnecting door through to our Son and Daughter-in-law in the next room, just wonderful.

He filled the coffee cup which over flowed and when he was ask to wipe the side, he responded in the most negative manner, as if service was done from a wayside cart in Vietnam or India, with residue of liquid around the cup and not clean.Certainly training and supervision is essential.

review_body: Being an Accor cardholder does not matter much in this hotel. You are not given priority and as a matter of fact transferred to a TRAINEE that took the longest time before our booking was confirmed. Before arriving I did the online check in that assured us that we can do an early check in and that the key was ready. Lo and behold, it was NOT. I was hoping this would make things more efficient as we needed to rush to a workshop upon arrival but we were made to WAIT. Further to this, when my key was not working, my registered room mate went down to have it changed. She was denied a key because it has to be me to have the key changed. What is the use of registering a room mate?! Breakfast is also a nightmare. The lines to the elevator is sooo long and when you reach the cafe, you still have to line up. Way too many people that the hotel can handle. Frankly this is disappointing. Further our package that was delivered to the hotel was brought to our room without our permission. Is that even correct? Shouldn't this be left at the front desk where we claim it? The only bright shining moment for this hotel is Charlie of concierge who graciously carried our baggage to and from our room with a smile. That's about it.

review_body: It was my first stay at Novotel Darling harbour after many times visiting Sydney.The location was perfect. Harbourside shopping centre at doorstep, cocklebay wharf with many choices of dining. Barely 5 min walk the ferry to Circular Quay and onwards to other destinations. The hotel itself. The staff are super friendly and welcoming. They gave me a welcome bottle of wine upon check in as it was my birthday.The breakfast had a good variety of hot and continental options.We had an Executive Harbour View Room, the first thing you see as you walk through the door is the amazing view of Darling Harbour, the sky scrapers of CBD.Good size room and clean decent size bathroom with variety of amenities.Over had an amazing experience and definitely be back here when visiting Sydney in the future.

review_body: Stayed here for 4 Nights, Room overlooking back streets! Room was 2 Double Beds so 1 for our 6 yr old and 1 for us. Being 6ft 3 was way too small but nothing else. Shower poor hardly any water pressure. Staff we found in most parts rude or not interested in particular in the Restaurant. Especially during breakfast time, Andrew though on front desk was super. Overall wouldn’t stay again, Sydney’s sights didn’t disappoint but Novotel did.

review_body: Great long stay here. Good room, clean and comfortable.Evening meal sat at the open kitchen was very enjoyable, nice conversation with the chef and good to see the fresh food prep / service.Location was good to walk around the harbour and to see the local sights.Easy 10 min walk to Town Hall station and from here great access to public transport to everywhere we wanted to go.Can get busy a breakfast and for the restaurant in the evening but no real issues for us with that.

review_body: If you can overlook a pretty basic check in & check out experience, the room was fantastic! I was in room 530 looking out directly over Darling Harbour. I arrived at night & the lights as I opened the door were breathtaking (not so great a view through the dirty window in daylight, but nevertheless, iconic Sydney!). The room was clean & well appointed - gowns & slippers too. Room service costs were reasonable & were the same price as the dining room (delivery fee only if you spend under $9.50). Bed very comfortable, great amenities...free wifi if you’re an Accor member. Concierge offered to get me a flat rate ‘car’ to the airport for $50. (On the way in, it was $55 in a taxi around 9pm at night). The flat rate was worth it on the way back to the airport as there was a traffic deadlock. I appreciated them suggesting it. Entry to the Hotel is unusual in that you come into a very small crowded & unwelcoming entry area with a concierge who immediately tells you you have to go up either escalators of lift to 1st floor to checkin...not very appealing.I stayed at this hotel in the early 1990s and it was top class and state of the art. Now it is just another hotel as there are lots of nice ones around. Whilst I found checkin staff & concierge service lacking, the bar staff, room service staff were great and after checking in and arriving at my room, I was prompted to complete a checkin survey. I did this & got a rapid response which was admirable.Be wary of comparable value for money, but overall, at this Novotel, the quality of the room and fantastic location makes this worthy of the 4 stars

review_body: I stayed here for one night for a work trip. We arrived and found that the person at work who had done the booking had got the date wrong. Thankfully the service was really wonderful and the team not only managed to rebook for us but we got it cheaper than the original booking. They also brought us coffee while we waited which was much appreciated given the early flight we'd been on. The room itself was roomy and comfortable and very clean. Only minor complaint from me was the bar wasn't open when we returned at 11.30pm in the evening which was a shame. Great location as well.

review_body: My husband and I roadtriped from Melbourne to Sydney for the weekend. We decided to stay at the Novotel based on reviews and location. We didn’t have any sort of expectations upon arriving at the hotel.Unfortunately for us, it was the little things that mattered that didn’t make it feel like the “fantastic experience” it should have been.Check-in was fast, the lady that served us was lovely. The room was really spacious and clean. We were staying in the 3rd floor and had the view of Harbourside Shopping Centre. The fact that it was connected to the shops was a massive thumbs up!There were two things my husband and I really wanted when we walked into our room was, toothbrushes/toothpaste and drinking water. Neither of these things were available READY in our room.We saw two bottles of water in the mini-bar but noticed it was not marked with a marker or sticker so we assumed it was complimentary. Apparently not. Only found out when we checked-out. I also thought it was bizarre that the dental kit wasn’t already available in our rooms. Had to call room service, which isn’t an issue, but it’s those little things that matter.The other thing we thought was that the parking within the hotel should have been complimentary with our stay...The hotel was lovely, the team are lovely...unfortunately with other choices in the Darling Harbour area, we will not be returning anytime soon to Novotel for the little things that matter to us.

review_body: I joined the Accor Plus program in 2018 and needed to use my complimentary night. I really though the program was a gimmick and was just keen on not throwing my membership away.We stayed on a Wednesday night and the experience was first class from the time we pulled into the driveway to ask for directions to parking. From there, it stayed as you would expect of a hotel of the Novotel's calibre.We stayed in a harbour facing room on the third floor and the room was well laid out and the view was fantastic. The only minor negatives were a slight smell of wet carpet and the shower recess needed a bit of detailing. Otherwise, great room, great bed. You need to like big fat pillows though, because if you don't, bring your own.I had initially planned at eating at one of the tourist-trap restaurants around darling harbour but hadn't read one decent review for any of them.We were recommended the in-house restaurant the Ternary by a staff member, as they should and I'm so glad we took up the offer. We were entitled to a heavy discount with our membership, but even without that I would have been more than happy with the food quality and quantity for the price. A great meal indeed.So without having to wander from the hotel, we had great food, great drinks, great accommodation and a fantastic view. There is an amazing seating area with ethanol fires and the hotel stay was a fantastic experience.If you get a call from Accor Plus team and are a regular traveller, it isn't a gimmick. With the complimentary drinks, discounted dining and room discounts you will more than get your membership back in a few rewarding stays.Breakfast is the most comprehensive buffet I've seen.

review_body: We stayed at the Novotel Sydney on Darling Harbour recently. We were on a higher floor with a harbour view. Overall the hotel was quite nice and staff generally friendly and willing to help. The restaurant and bar on the Friday night was jumping with people enjoying a drink with friends. The room we had was well equipped, large and comfortable. The restaurant for breakfast was a bit chaotic and staff a little indifferent. Clearly, there must be turnover off staff and perhaps a bit more focus on training might remedy some of the below par service. With the addition of the Sofitel Hotel, Accor has a full hand of hotels, Sofitel, Novotel and Ibis located close to each other. Not sure if this is a sound strategy but no doubt Accor Group has thought this through. The Novotel Darling Harbour is well established and presents well. Worth a stay.

review_body: First time in Sidney, we stayed here with family and not disappointed...It is located right within Darling Harbour area, so you get all the area has to offer, entertainments, foods, shopping, sceneries, the hardrock cafe is just next door, along with pubs and restaurant..excellent locationAirport taxi took you aprox 30 mins, cost around $50 .. the hotel is also located on top of Light Train Station " The Convention" it connect you with the main Train Station "The Central" also if you chose ferry, this hotel pretty much next door to the "Pyrmont Bay" so this location give you very easy access to go anywhere i Sidney using Ferry, Train , Light Train and Bus.. btw the "Train" is equivalent to MRT or Subway as in Hongkong, Japan or Singapore.. except the Train in Sidney is nicer.. they are double decker train, with seating arrangement just like a regular train ..unlike those typical MRT / subway side seated style with fiberglass long chairs - see my pics To take the Train, Light Train, Bus and Ferry you need to purchase an "Opal Card" just like any other regular MRT card, this is a top up value card, BUT unlike other country, the balance in Opal card can not be refunded.. so it stays in the card, and they can not be used to pay for purchase at merchants either.. so for visitor and tourist, this can be annoying that you can not take your balance back and you dont know when to comeback.. so its kinda a waste of money..Oo also, it doesn't work nationally .. we travel to Melbourne.. and they use different payment system on their transportation lines, Opal card is not accepted .. this is what i "hate" about transport line in Australia.. also the mapping signage inside the lines are not effective.. you have to keep asking the staff in the station especially hub station like "Central", of where to go, what exit to take to connect with other lines etc... i hope they can improve this.. but the staff are always around and very helpful, nice and friendly..Back to the hotel, all are perfect, staff are typically Australian who are friendly and helpful, the lobby are homey and warm, rooms are in big size, the twin back can accomodate 4 asian size adults, so in my case we travelled with 2 kids.. the twin beds are fits..Perhaps they only need to improve the wifi access, they limit access to 3 devices only.. nowadays when you travel with family.. every member has gadget and everyone desperately need wifi access, so this is the hassle.. also they charge wifi access for $10 but this can be managed by registering yourself to IHG member and they waived the wifi fee .. but it's a lame marketing attempt i might say, sorry.. :-)Overall, happy to comeback here..

review_body: I got a room with the harbour view and it was amazing to be able to watch the fireworks from my room. The room itself is spacious and comfortable but a little dated, like the rest of the building. The sound-proofing is terrible and I can hear other guests walking and talking about the corridor as well as doors opening and slamming. There is a shopping centre and many restaurants conveniently located very near the hotel but the nearest train/subway station is about 10-15 minutes walk away and the nearest bus stop is about 5-7 minutes. Overall the hotel was less than what I expected but I still had an enjoyable stay.

review_body: I still had a great stay at this hotel but it could have been so much better. I had requested an early check in but the room wasn’t ready when I arrived. They said the manager would call me to let me know when it was but they never did. When I finally checked for the 3rd time after the standard check in time I finally got the room. The room was really nice and worth the wait but the sofa bed wasn’t made up. Whilst this was being fixed I examined the room and noticed the top of the wardrobe had around half of an inch of dust and other parts of the room could have been a lot cleaner. Whilst on cleanliness, the shaded area near the pool looked like it hadn’t been cleaned for several days and the tent fabric itself was dirty and mouldy.The room was set up for 2 people, so two chairs, glasses and towels etc when they knew there were 3 people staying. The room was serviced everyday but none of the small items were replaced like tea bags etc. There were just so many small things that had a slight negative affect on the overall trip.Saying all of the above, I still had a good time. The location is amazing, the staff are friendly despite the issues and it was good value for money for the Easter weekend.I would return but hopefully some more TLC has been put in before then.

The room was microscopic and for $450 looked over a laneway and the backs of old apartment buildings. Terrible! The rooms was so small that even the work desk was a half size to make the room seem normal size. On check in I was presented with a welcome gift. Imagine my disappointment to discover it was a bottle of water in a bag. You can drink the tap water in Sydney - so why? Waste of plastic and dashed expectations. Next time I'll save my money and stay elsewhere.

review_body: Stayed in a 2 bedroom apartment which had a good amount of space. I love how you can do laundry and it's useful to have a kitchen especially with little kids. It is convenient location - there are nearby eateries and supermarkets. Parking costs extra.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is a pleasure to stay at the Merinton Suites Hotel in Zetland. The place is very clean, good location, friendly customer service. Parking is secured and convenient.There are many restaurants closed by. Highly recommended.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Service was impeccable. Rooms are modern, clean and comfortable. Highly recommended. Location is very central to Sydney and there are some great restaurants/eateries well within walking distance. Indoor pool is a winner, especially at this time of year.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thank you for making my stay enjoyable, you property was fantastic, with great access to the Zetland village below. The lower floor had a little road noise but level 16 was perfect. Thankyou for the great service
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a very lovely welcome from the front desk staff on arrival. Rooms were very clean and surprisingly quite. Will definitely stay there next trip if possible. Also the apartments were very close to shops and lots of places to eat.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Helpful, friendly staff - nothing is too much trouble. Comfortable, spacious rooms, with balcony access. Convenient location which includes a nearby shopping village with specialty foods and all essentials.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Arrived on an early flight and was kindly allowed to check in.Isabelle was very helpful and charming which was very welcome after an "red eye" flight.This was my third stay at the Meriton Zetland and I find it to be in a very ideal location, out of busy downtown but yet within easy proximity.Will definitely be staying at the Meriton Zetland during my next visit.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I loved my short stay at Meriton Suites in Zetland, and would like to come back for a longer holiday.The apartment was amazingly big and spacious and I particularly loved the swimming pool & spa, both of which had proper steps going down into them, so that a senior like myself (who walks with a cane) could safely get down into them...fantastic!
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent several nights in a 2 bedroom apartment with our 2.5 year old daughter, and we had a great time. The apartment was spacious and well appointed, with amazing views to the city skyline and sweeping views from the east to the west. We were located on level 21 and north facing which made the outlook uninterrupted. Staff were helpful, and close by are plenty of parks and pathways for kids to scooter or play. Also close by is a very nice shopping centre with great food outlets and a Coles for the day to day items. Would recommend staying here. If you are interested in Audi cars, there is a large dealership next door if you can control your spending!
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great service. Parking only $20 per night.Good ratesGreat location Great places to eat near byWiFi excellentBig rooms Kitchen well maintained Bed comfy and huge Shower great pressure Heaps of storage Washer and dryer Nice pod coffee too Would easily stay again Staff at front counter amazing Cleaners were awesome always checked room was done and if anything needed was not at all a problem to supply.Great digs merriton you should be very proud of your staff
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent value for money. Comfortable accommodation and easy access to restaurants and supermarket. In total, 4th stay at a Meriton Suites property in the last 12 months. Second stay at this property in two months and planning to stay again in future.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The suite was bright and clean, in good condition, and had all the necessary comforts (proper kitchenette with the necessary kitchen ware and utensils, washer & dryer, etc) with plenty of room for the kids to run around.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been fortunate enough to explore our world. I haven't been everywhere, mostly Europe and the South Pacific. I have been disappointed by shonky travel agents and European hotels. But Meriton Suites Zetland has never disappointed me. I have to tip my hat in the first instance to Harry Triguboff. His planning and design ream has made the rest so much easier. Great reception team and booking was so easy. We even decided to join the Meriton club for the great discount offers. Will we ever go back to the rat race of others? No thank you Meriton for making our stays in Sydney easy.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I called the CS and they picked up the phone very long time and sent the stuff almost 1 hour. I think they need more staff to cover. They also need more staff for helping to carry the baggage because sometimes for the family they have many baggage.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Suitable accommodation for business or leisure and everything is supplied for a comfortable stay. Very close to restaurants and shops which is within walking distance. Also close to Airport. Definitely can recommend this apartment hotel.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful accommodation. Good, friendly service. Good facilities. More advice should be given about parking at the time of booking to avoid confusion. The room was magnificent but a little expensive. Overall, a good experience.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We've stayed at Meriton Suites Zealand as a family twice now, and both times have been great. Staff are friendly and helpful, the apartment is clean, spacious and comfortable. Its our `go to` place when we are in Sydney.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Natasha at the front desk was extremely helpful and very accommodating! We were treated kindly and our room was immaculate! Overall, the staff were great and I can never fault Meriton Zetland! My favourite place to stay!
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Front desk staff were amazing! Could not have been more accommodating!Great location, lovely room - balcony overlooking green courtyard was an added bonus. Close to supermarket but also convenient food delivery service.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wow what great accommodation I really enjoyed my stay the room was enormous and very comfortable. The shower was awesome with great pressure. The bed was super comfy and the pillows were heavenly. The staff were friendly security was a little over the top. Only thing I was disappointed in was having to watch kids on the roof taking drugs and climbing walls, putting themselves in danger to high from security. This was on the roof of the reception area. How did they even get up there? (photo attached)
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Meriton Suites Zetland for 2 weeks and the experience was simply amazing. We were there with our baby who is 1.2 years old so a well-equipped accommodation was more than desirable. The suites was new, clean & spacious. It is also conveniently located - 2 mins to bus stop & eateries & East Village mall!! Couldn't ask for a better place to stay. We'll defo choose to stay here again when we're in Sydney.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: lovely room, close to the city and outer suburbs, facilities are excellent. Only issue we had was the toaster kept blowing the electricity and response time was a bit slow, other than that we would stay there again.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good clean accomodation friendly greeting at reception. A little disappointed with the bed it was Lumpy and totally uncomfortable other than that all good. Was happy with all other features . Street Parking was a little hard to find outside however there is ample onsite parking .
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great staff Clean and tidy apartment Close to train and other transport. Great shopping just around the corner as well as restaurants . Facilities including heated pool sauna and gym. Reasonable rates and the most comfortable bed anywhere. Nothing better for value.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Once again great stay at zetland The place is great to stay at, great staff and close to supermarket and restaurant. My preferred Meriton, easy access to carpark and gate pass works unlike Meriton at Waterloo
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to stay for a weekend, close to the CBD, delicious places to eat around the hotel. Staff were amazing, attentive and provided great customer service. House keeping staff were beautiful and ensured we had everything we needed.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Needs better security , people were drinking and partying in the pool area at 5am and the spa had spew in it , the room was modern but the sheets were stained , nice big bath and the staff are wonderful , overall a nice place to stay
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were part of a group booking. Upon arriving from work after midnight, we realised only one bedroom and ensuite was unlocked even though we had booked a 2 bed apartment. After a number of calls, housekeeping finally unlocked another room and went to walk straight out. The bed was completely unmade. I had to call them back to try the third room (which luckily was made), by which time I had waited at least 40 minutes for a bedroom and a bathroom. When the bathroom was unlocked, it looked as if it had not been cleaned or used for a while. In my job, we have very little time to sleep so I was very disappointed at how long it took to just get the other room opened. The front desk staff did their best but I wouldn't stay again.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed at a few different Meriton apartment’s in the Sydney area, Chatswood, Bondi Junction and Zetland. The rooms have been top class, my only disappointment is the gym equipment at the Zetland Meriton are not as up to date as the other two Meriton’s that I have stayed at previously.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can enjoy taking a bath without worrying of spraying the water everywhere as the shower cubicle uses sliding glass door instead of the very common half-glass partition. It will be much better if the lighting in the bedroom is of warm colour instead of the fluorescent white . Replacement of garbage bags is too frequent even if there's just a small piece of paper in the bag. Previous chat on line with Meriton staff promised every apartment has a DVD Player yet this is not true.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I always look forward to my trips to Sydney and staying at the Meriton makes it that much more enjoyable. The facilities are great and everything that you need is very close. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This apartment style accommodation is outstanding value for money. Large and very comfortable appartments. Service is outstanding. The location is excellent with East Village shopping complex next door and a direct bus service to the City from a near by street I am already a regular at the Meriton Suites Zetland and will continue to be so!
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was super clean and well equipped. Love the Kevin Murphy products. However, it smelt like a Vietnamese restaurant had vacated it. I love Vietnamese food, but don't want the smell of it, or any other cuisine, in the room.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I needed 1 nights accommodation, at the end of a road trip and for the price, in Sydney, didn't expect much. I was VERY impressed and, if the opportunity for another, preferably longer, stay comes around, I will be sure to stay here again.I had a well appointed, clean and spacious 1 bedroom apartment. It had a good and functional layout, was close to shops and restaurants and overall, excellent value for money.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've stayed at the Meriton Zetland on many occasions. I like the fact that you can park your car (at a reasonable cost) and can simply walk to a nearby restaurant or shop at Coles if you would prefer to cater for yourself. Apartment rooms are clean, spacious and supplied with everything you could need. Not the best location for public transport but not the worst either. Staff are always helpful & courteous and even the housekeeping staff greet you with a smile and a hello. Some of the rooms can be quite noisy but this is generally a result of the freeway nearby and noise from people on the streets below. The hotel does seem to be becoming popular for large numbers of people booking in to 'socialise' in apartments, but thankfully this hasn't been an issue for us personally. The apartments are all of a different configuration which is not always ideal. We have stayed in studio, one bedroom and 2 bedroom apartments and we've have had some lovely quiet & spacious rooms with great views, but also some apartments that are quite small and not so quiet. I always request a room in a quiet part of the hotel away from the freeway but of course this can't be guaranteed. I will certainly continue to stay at Meriton Zetland.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay at this hotel a lot while in Sydney and it’s always really clean and the rooms are so much more spacious than your average hotel room. Parking is also only $20 per month, sounds like a lot but it’s the cheapest in Sydney by far (some hotels charge up to $80 per night)Staff friendly. Beds comfortable.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very good. The serviced apartments are located within a 5-minute walking distance of a shopping centre with all your modern needs and conveniences like restaurants and supermarkets. The serviced apartments have all the necessary amenities required for longer stays like a washer, a dryer and a fully equipped kitchen. I especially liked that I can call guest services for refills and many other items that aren't normally provided like chopsticks, extra coffee, extra milk pods, and a rice cooker.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable clean and well equipped one bedroom suite. Great rates easy check in and friendly staff! Well worth the money and in a great trendy area of Sydney close to all public transport, clubs and nightlife.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Value for money , speedy check & check out...the property is near grocery store that is open till 12pm...though a bit of a walk to the trains, bus stop is not as far...all in all, not that bad as you get to walk around residential area & is quite an interesting walk...staff areaccommodating and nice, complete amenities & toiletries! will definitely recommend!
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed there for 5 nights in May 2019. Good location if you are visiting Sydney and have a car; easy drive to the beach or downtown. Spacious apartments perfect for families, with reasonable prices and underground parking.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we have stayed here a few time and have loved it every time the staff are always great and the rooms are like a home away from home and now whenever we go to anywhere the meriton is the first place we look for
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay here almost every month for work, and also for personal trips to Sydney. Here's why;The staff are always courteous and efficient. Rooms are reasonably modern and well appointed. Beds firm and comfy with good pillow selection (ask staff for help). Well-equipped kitchenette and laundry. Close to East Village shopping centre with supermarkets, restaurants, bars. Short walk to buses or catch an Uber into the city. Parking is more affordable here than city locations, which is why we stay here when driving to Sydney.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Large Room, great area (really close to restaurants and supermarket). We arrived really early in the morning (8.30 am). We are so tired after a long flight and they allowed us to do early check in! Super super grateful as we can have rest earlier. Thank you, Meriton! Definitely will choose Meriton group for the next stay
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staffs are very nice, friendly and helpful who made me feel more than welcome! A early check-in was arranged after a long international flight. Thanks! The capsule coffee machine is a nice update since I last stay couple of years ago.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Meriton rooms have a consistently high quality across all their locations and Zetland was no exception. Room was excellent value for money and location was handy to CBD and inner suburbs. Position of site near Eastern Distributor off ramp was convenient and no issues encountered with road noise. In fact room was incredibly quiet.Highly recommended and will stay again
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I/we have stayed many times at various Meriton Apartments in Sydney region. The apartments are all well appointed, very clean, generously and practically furnished, beds are very comfortable. Most Meriton apartment blocks are near shopping and public transport. The reception staff are always friendly, polite and helpful. When I am in Sydney, Meriton is the only place for me.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easy going staff. Relaxed atmosphere. Easy to rebook and extend nights. really felt like I was on my own apartment. Validating car park was done with ease. Never questioned by any staff regarding parking tickets.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: For business travel you are used to cramming into a small room, but Meriton gives you the chance to be well located, with a little more room and all the things you need - good wifi, clean rooms, great bed.Just need to improve the checkin process for business travellers, very cumbersome even for a regular visitor with a business account.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The express and full service were not very desirable..... Housekeeping not done properly in express format cannot be recovered in full service. This sort of services only give staff leverage to get away their lousy service.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: beautiful modern spacious apartments, close to shops & public transport. It was a great place to stay. much better than a hotel. There was a tv in the bedroom as well as the lounge which makes it better than being stuck in one room if you want to watch it. there was also plenty of wardrobe space. It was like a home away from home. very comfortable. the hand basin was slow to empty which I advised housekeeping on my exit. no big drama.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good hair straighteners, free toothpaste and cloud like bed. What more could you want? Super local and you can’t hear the cars. I liked the heater across the bed and big shutters. Will definitely visit again
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to stay. Close to everything and fantastic apartments. Spacious, clean and very comfortable bed. Home away from home. Great little break away from everything. You can do heaps of stuff or just relax.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: room was excellent, spacious, lots of facilities, clean and comfortable. Staff were very nice. Good restaurant close by and only a 30minute walk to the SCG to see Collingwood beat the very gallant Swans.
hotelName:
1    Meriton Suites Zetland
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the hotel is located in the quiet side of Surry Hills. a bit far from the metro. but the bus station is just around the corner. there is a grocery and pharmacy nearby. and the staff are very accommodating and helpful on directions and needs. coin operated laundry is available at the basement.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are well-appointed and fairly-priced. Great room service options and friendly staff. The hotel is in an ideal location for walking to Hyde Park, Oxford St, Kings Cross, Surry Hills, and more.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a couples vacation. The hotel was centrally located a minutes from the bus stop or train station. The reception was attentive and secured our luggage until we were able to check in so we could tour around the city. The room was small but comfortable enough for the two of us. The jacuzzi was out but the pool was working and the water temperature was nice warm. I totally Recommend this hotel, and will stay there again.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Made the mistake of staying in the cheap rooms of this usually awesome hotel. If you can’t afford to stay in the good rooms you’re better off finding somewhere else.We had a room near the pool, small but clean, and I could forgive the overwhelming smell of chlorine as I knew I was saving money, but the noise kicked off at 5:45 each morning resulted in two very poor nights sleep.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A nice, older hotel in the area. The triple room was spacious. One of the beds was still standing on its end when we checked in, but upon notifying the front desk, the matter was quickly taken care of. We based our visit in Sydney here at the hotel for 4 days and we find the location convenient, close to many buses and walking distance to great restaurants and cafes. Train stations are a bit farther.  Convenient airport shuttle available for AUD16. My fav coffee shop Paramount Coffee Project is just a few min walk away. I will choose to stay here again next time I find myself in Sydney.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location was ok. Staff were lovely. However, for a premium room, the value was not there. The beds really did need to be more comfortable and one of the double beds needs replacing as the springs on one side were loud and squeaky. We have stayed in many hotels within a wide budget range and never have experienced anything quite like it. The mattresses were spongy. The Saturday night in particular was awful. Paper thin walls, could hear pub noise from across the street until early hours of the morning and the room was too hot despite using the air con (had to close the balcony door due to street noise). Not a refreshing night's sleep. The room was tastefully decorated and it was clean. Bathroom and shower were good too. However, we expected more as most of the tripadvisor reviews were great. Baccomatto restaurant adjacent to the hotel for lunch was excellent.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean bright and friendly -close to city and Surrey hills Shops and cafes and transport to the airport. The rooms are fresh and clean with all amenities. It seems to have its finger on the pulse for tours but I like the small boutique feel
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My first stay at the hotel was great. Helpful from the start with parking then great check in made easy. The room was large clean and seemed recently renovated. Love the balcony to get fresh air. Perfect location to all the great restaurants whilst close to the heart of the city for work. Have already booked my next stay.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything is within reach and it is only about 10 mins to the city. The hotel rates are pretty fair when we booked it. Not sure whether it is a seasonal rate but we are happy with it. even though the bed was a bit squeaky but we did manage to sleep pretty soundly. No complain there...
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I spent 2 nights at Cambridge Hotel. The location is great and the rooms are very clean. The staff at the front desk was always very helpful with anything that we needed. They stored our bags prior to check-in and after check-out so that we could explore the city. They also allowed us to use a "freshen up" room on the 2nd floor to shower and change after and before our flights. We were very happy with our stay!
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fabulous location - a quick walk to the city centre, loads of great dining and cafe options, bars, shops, people watching. Clean, spacious and quiet. A real bargain - I always stay here when I'm in the city. Highly recommended for solo, couples or families.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great accommodation at a good price Good location for city attractions Friendly and helpful staff all very knowledge and courteous Rooms are always clean and neat and comfortable Regular visitor also stay there when in Sydney
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent service and facilities. Staying at the.Cambridge is always a wonderful experience. Every staff member is courteous and polite. Nothing is too much bother. Meals are excellent also.The location is central and accessible.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Car park was very hard to get into and out of, but the overall experience was very good. Great location, great service as well as clean and tidy. Value for money. Helpful staff who had good knowledge of the area.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a night when in town watching the footy. Nice easy 20 min walk to the SCG past plenty of pubs and bars. Good clean, spacious room with a view of the opera house from the balcony. Staff at check in and out were polite and courteous.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean and great location. Would recommend as it is great value for money.Not many other options with this level quality for the price.The italian restaraunt down stairs is an amazing place to eat too
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nearly every time I come to Sydney this is the place I stay. Great location friendly, helpful staff with great facilities. My only criticism is the car park very tight and small cars would be recommended.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great staff, always very helpful and friendly, we have been staying here for business for the past 4 years now and will continue to stay at the cambridge, good location, everything you need for a city visit!!
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 6 nights in a one bedroom deluxe. We were very happy with the size and layout of the room. Housekeeping was to a high standard. All front desk staff were very helpful, friendly and efficient. Could not ask for anything more. The location was excellent for us. Plenty of shops and eating places close by. Only 5 minutes walk to Musuem train station and Hyde Park.The Hotel had a very comfortable and homely feel when returning from a full busy sightseeing day on a cold winter day.Thank you for making our stay in Sydney such a comfortable and pleasant experience.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful value hotel in a great location meaning a short walk to the CBD, public transport, cafes etc.Friendly staff welcome you...my suite was large and spacious. Comfy bed, Buffet breakfast, Cable channels. Good views from 11th floor.Great value, complimentary chocolate and gym passes add a nice touch tooLack of hot water sometimes was an issue early in the morning I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anybody
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Always friendly, personable and helpful staff. Room was spacious and clean. Room service was quick and meal was delicious. Had no problems getting a taxi to and from. Would definitely recommend, and would stay again.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: clean fresh friendly staff there upon arrival, check in was easy and smooth, room was spacious fresh and we opted for the balcony room and saw the beautiful city lines and could even see the peaks of the opera house from the window. Great stay, nice and quite being s close to the city. had a wonderful stay.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is well placed, walking distance to Central Station, Tower B and a heap of restaurants and bars. The room had great views, was quiet, away from busy traffic sounds and the lifts were quick. The InRoom food service was incredibly good value, coming from a local restaurant. Loved the personalised Chocolate Bar I received upon checkout.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is not overly fancy but very comfortable & clean & it was in a great location for our needs. We had a medical appointment in Crown Street & it was only a short walk away. The city was also only a short bus or taxi trip away too. There are also plenty of options for dining in the areaThe staff were very helpful & friendly. All around we had a great stay & we would be happy to stay there again.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was worth every cents. Hotel is at a good location. Room was clean and comfy, more than what I expected. I didn't have any problems with my sleep as I usually would. The only thing that I think can be improved is, a pair of slippers may comes handy for travellers.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Service was very good.About the room...They provided wifi for just 3 devices in the "guest free" option, you could pay more for more speed and more devices. 1) It wasn't free, we paid more than 200 AUD/night 2) Not in room Wifi, the signal wasn't fully strong. 3) If you are a couple and you have 2 computers and 2 phones, well, bad luck.Lack of some common items like toothpaste or disposable shoes I'm use to find.There is a metro station at 750m, a bit far, but a bus which takes you to the center at just 50m.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Enjoyed our stay here. Customer Service was tops and very friendly. Couldn't have asked for a better location. 3 mins walk to the nearest bus stop and Museum station was 6 mins walk. Restaurants and convenient stores were close by. Will definitely return in my next visit.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I don't have anything really negative to say about this hotel. The location is great so close to the CBD, right next to Oxford St which was what I needed. Staff were friendly, helpful and efficient. Room was very nice, good size, very clean and the bed was comfortable. Price was reasonable given that this is Sydney and it has a great location. My only minor complaint is that the blackout curtain needs to go a little further at either end of the window to stop the morning light if you want to sleep in - but this was such a minor detail.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: an excellent location close to Museum train station as long as you dont mind a short walk (5min). Easy if you need to be up this end of the city and close access to airport train line. Plenty of restaurants and bars close by.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff at this hotel are very accommodating. The room was very clean and beds were comfortable. It’s tucked away from the main attractions of Sydney, but for those looking to stay in the neighborhood, it’s a safe bet for a good night’s sleep at a reasonable price.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What we liked:1. communication - fast and helpful. I sent a few emails and the replies were quick and detailed2. rooms - spacious enough, clean, comfortable beds3. wifi is strong, for 3 devices4. good location - just walk down the street and turn left for Hungry Jacks, Oporto and IGA and ALDI for groceries. Walk down a bit more and you will get to Hyde Park and the Museum stationWe didnt try the restaurant so I cant comment about the foodThe laundry is a bit challenging to find but it has two dryers and washers. Soap can be bought from the front desk.A very pleasant stay in Cambridge.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent value for money. Staff were very friendly and approachable. Close to all amenities and public transport. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a clean, comfortable hotel that’s extremely affordable.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had really good stay.. Spacious and clean room.. Helpful staff. On the top of that very good location. 10-20mins walk can reach city and other important icon of Sydney CBD. Highly recommended. Will be back again
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: More training needed. Select your BEST people and train the rest to be of the same standard.Breakfast people were just pleasant. They needed to wow people so that it starts there day. Service is OK, One girl never even spoke to the people at breakfast. There were more guests speaking to each other making each other welcome. YOUR staff should also be doing that. NOT just going through the motions and come over false. Problems like this can come from the management. the management can overpressure staff and the staff come over as they are not happy. I hope this helps. The Cambridge is bordering on 5 star and with more passion from the staff it could be 10 star !!!!!!!.That is outstanding/excellent/5 star. Cheers Bill Allardyce room 707 Friday 14/6/19
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stay at the Cambridge Hotel several times a year. The staff are very friendly and efficiently,the rooms are always cleaned to a very high standard. The Cambridge Hotel is also at a great location right next to Oxford St Surry Hills where you can party all night long.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great value for money. Easy to get anywhere from here we enjoy walking and loved being able to explore inner Sydney. Rooms are always clean and comfortable. The staff are friendly and you never have to wait to get there attention and I appreciate they always acknowledge you and say hello even when passing through foyer.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel has a big room with balcony. It's location is one of the best near the night life area though its on a quieter side. The staff are so courteous and polite. They have a nice touch at the end of your stay. A personalize chocolate bar.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ok hotel. But not 4 star, more like 2. Don't expect a late bar, both times closed, on Monday at 22:00 ????????????? - not good- very poor, worst I have ever encountered in my travels all around the world. Sad to say this has tainted my view if the hotel. Would most definitely not recommended it to anyone I know.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I like this hotel as it close to Surry Hills, good walk to anywhere, just like staying in you city apartment and has balcony for fresh air when needed. Buffet Breakfast needs a lot of help tho...half was cold and tasteless
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I really love this place and have stayed here a bunch of times. I wish they would get some bluetooth speakers though instead of the outdated ipod docks haha. Also this time around I had to call to get minibar items delivered which i found a bit weird. Butnthe staff are akways amazing and I will certainly stay here again.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to stay in the centre of everything. Lovely staff who accommodate all requests and are very friendly. Love the heated pool which is great to relax in after a long day of exploring and shopping.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the more affordable wing. The rooms were fine, nothing too spectacular. Must bring own set of toiletries and slippers. Hotel is near good eating places such as Bread & More, The Sushi Train, and The Porterhouse. There is also a supermarket nearby (Aldi). Staff are mostly friendly.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our experience at the Cambridge was excellent. Anastacia at the front desk was amazing! She is warm, welcoming and easy to speak with. I felt like I was talking with a good friend that you have a definite comfort level with. Our service was limited - little time spent at the hotel - but very good. Our room was always clean and clean towels and toiletries always restocked. experienced. The room itself felt tired (old) but clean and functional. The bathroom was very small so shower challenging for a tall or larger person. The location of the hotel is great. It is in the business district close to shops, restaurants, and across from the police station. The hotel itself is in need of upgrades. It is an old building that has seen better days. The rooms look old and the floor hallways are narrow. The elevators are small but the service cannot be beat.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location in Surry Hills on border with Darlinghost. Tons of nearby stores, restaurants, bars, etc. Quiet corner near police station.Hotel looks old, room was odd shaped, but comfortable for one person. Very clean linens and bathroom. AC worked. Kettle with coffee and tea in closet.Staff was nice, but late check-out would have cost additional charge.Spa was out of order,. Indoor pool looked dirty, so did not use.May repeat if I need to be in area.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for a week and were met with friendly and helpful staff team! Room was a good size and the beds was comfortable. We were surprised to have ‘European’ pillows. These were so so comfy. The manager Steven Gargona is charming and so very enables us to feel at home during our stay in Sydney.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel in brilliant location, near loads of bars and restaurants and close to public transport. Hotel is clean and comfortable albeit a little dated. But makes up for it with terrific rates. Check it out.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall, the experience was good. Rooms are clean,Nice location, close to everything you need, from bars to supermarkets,chemists to bottleshops.Staff are friendly znd courteous,Use a small car as carpark underground is tightand at $35 pn, i suppose that Sydney would we stay again? Yes
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Smooth check in and check out. Front desk staff excellent. Despite busy, still made the effort to acknowledge me while in queue. Comfy bed and room was quite spacious. Can't wait to come back again =)
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed twice in the last 4 weeks. Greeted by warm reception staff. Accommodation was clean and quiet with AC, fridge, tea and coffee provided. Walking distance to Oxford Street, Hyde Park, Central and Museum stations.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Two night stay at the Cambridge during a weekend trip to Sydney was very pleasant. Staff were courteous and room and public spaces of hotel clean and well presented. Room wasn't serviced until sometime after 14:00 in the afternoon, by which time we had returned and preparing for other activities. 'Do not disturb' was honoured and the offer to have room serviced at a later time was left by housekeeping.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I always try and stay at this hotel its good value.There's a great coffee shop just round the corner and the Irish Pub across the road serves luvverly grub.Underground parking is very convenient and its not far to the centre of town,Botanical Gardens and the National Gallery.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved staying here for a week recently. The service was excellent, rooms modern, clean, and spacious. We especially loved how friendly the front desk staff were. Anastasia was so warm and friendly, she is an asset to the hotel. Will be coming back to Cambridge for sure!
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Enjoyed the stay here. Apart from it being centrally located, a whole bunch of eat-out options were at a walk-able distance.Excellent and courteous staff. The hotel manager in particular was super friendly and gave us a lot of sight-seeing tips.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I enjoyed a lovely two night stay at this well appointed and conveniently located Hotel. The Hotel is an easy walk into the Sydney CBD, and very close to Central Station. Surrey Hills has many great cafes and restaurants, all close by to the Hotel..Highly recommended.
hotelName:
2    Cambridge Hotel Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Vibe Rushcutters is well located and, from our experience, very good value for money. It is our regular Sydney choice for accommodation. Our only disappointment was the Room Service menu, which offers limited and unimaginative choices.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From reception, to bar and restaurant staff to room service, happy, helpful and keen to be pleasant. Clean, tidy, warm and inviting. Awesome stay. Small room but you only sleep in it. Would have no issues going back there again.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent Hotel, very friendly and welcoming staff. If you are looking for a Hotel in Rushcutters Bay, be sure to give them a chance to help you with what you need. We were on the 4th Floor facing the main road and heard very little noise.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Food was well below standard, dry and uninteresting.The cleaner left a pillow case and towel on our third day not sure the room was cleaned that well Front counter team were excellent especially a young trainee who exhibited excellent customer skills
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: From the front desk staff to the function staff and cafe/bar staff, every single person was friendly, approachable and extremely accommodating. The function facilities were excellent. The food variety was wonderful and delicious, with special food needs accommodated for and also delicious.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all, thank you for preparing my room and you helped me doing early check in. That made my whole plan perfect since I relaxed fully from my long flight on the first day.They served clean room every day and the bathroom was big enough.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Dining here with a friend was a taste extravaganza. My pan seared Barramundi was perfect. My friend enjoyed a perfectly cooked steak. Oops but no veggies as that needs to ordered.We enjoyed a relaxing meal chatting but the room was cold as charity. Even after asking for some heating. Hence dinner was done and dusted by 8.10pm whilst wearing jackets. Hey guys, it's winter!
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff here are amazing, so kind, helpful and lovely (for the most part only one bad DM on the first night). I love the location of the hotel, the food is awesome and the facilities are great. I love this place and would recommend to anyone.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved this hotel. Great views from rooms and the lovely rooftop pool and deck. 5 mins from either Edgecliff or Kings Cross stations means it's easy to access and use as a base for sightseeing. Good breakfast selection and friendly staff.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Good location & great pillows but couple of things that really annoyed me - * Unpack bags and go up to reception but now have to take down parking voucher to leave on car dash. Why must I carry my bags back down to place voucher then back up to room. Surely a rego number is suffice?* Poor room service menu* States 4.5 stars - no mini bar?
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Vibe is in a great location next to a lovely park. It is easy to get into the city centre or out to Bondi, and the staff are friendly, the rooms are fresh and clean. The breakfast was nice and the fish at dinner cooked well.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great treasure to stay at with the bay near by. I always come back to this hotel when I’m needing accommodation in Sydney. Lovely reception staff and support staff in the dining area and on the floors doing their room preparation.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I love Vibe, Rushcutters Bay and I keep coming back. It is in the best location, by the harbour, on a park, the rooftop pool. All this combines to make you want to stay, keep coming back. The staff are very helpful and welcoming.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good, clean rooms and facilities, friendly and helpful staff. Comfortable ascetically appealing. Underground parking is available. Check out of 11 am on the Sunday was good because we weren't rushed. Would definitely stay again as taxi ride to the city was under $20 so we were able to go to the Theatre on the first night and the Sydney Comedy Festival on the second.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay started with an upgrade with our room on the top floor overlooking the Rushcutters Bay Park. Our room was spotless and the bed very comfortable with excellent linen. The staff were friendly and helpful arranging taxis during our stay and storage the day we left … the best part was arriving back to the hotel early one evening to find our room decorated with a Happy Birthday banner across the curtains , a dozen helium balloons on the ceiling plus a decadent slice of chocolate cake and a card for my husbands birthday !!! The Vibe is close to Potts Point and all the fab cafes and resturants in this area . It has a bus stop nearby and is a 5 minute walk to Kings Cross station. For us it was the perfect spot to spend 5 days in Sydney. Thank You Vibe Team - keep up the Good Vibes.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic staff always smiling , great food excellent service. The rooms were great and I do look as i'm a house keeper so very impressed. I dropped a plate and the staff were right there to clean it up, and they couldn't do enough for you. Thank you for the wonderful service really appreciated. would stay again.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed here for our stop over in Sydney. Whe had arrived room was not ready but that was because we arrived early, for the inconvenience hotel upgraded us to a penthouse suite at no extra charge. The customer service was very good, I would highly recommend to anyone staying in Sydney.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Amazing hotel really loved stay thank you - look forward to next visit - was a business trip 88 of us but still the care from staff felt very personal- setting and food really beautiful catered for all our needs
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Woken up 3 times by mistake during my stay here. First incorrect wake up call for someone else and then housekeeping banging on my door at two different times all whilst I was trying to sleep. Obviously no communication with reception and housekeeping as to who has what room and check out times. I called reception and they couldn’t have cared less. Staff are noisy and all inexperienced backpackers there for the money. It’s equivalent to a 1 star motel on a highway. Stay elsewhere.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Parking your car is easy. The rooms (view on the garden) were good, modern, good beds. Restaurant was good enough. Relaxed atmosphere. Pool in the morning a joy. 10 minutes walk to the station. Close to the center and Bondi Beach by underground.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Reception staff very accommodating, room was quiet, had a lovely view and towels changed daily. Only request would be for some side tables beside the bed be a bit larger! Not much space to place an IPad, clock, phone, glass of water and tablets.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: The hotel room was spotless, very nicely decorated, all the fixtures, fittings, linen and bathroom appeared to be brand new. review_body: Have stayed at the Vibe, Rushcutters Bay on several occasions. It has a top location overlooking the park and with harbour views. Short bus or train trip to the city or Watsons Bay and a ferry ride.Comfortable beds. Relaxed atmosphere and great value for money.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: I just enjoyed another great stay. Love the location; the quiet, clean & comfortable room and friendly staff. An easy walk to Potts Point, Double Bay and Paddington and located on beautiful Rushcutters Park overlooking the bay. Looking forward to my next visit. Thank you.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Stayed for first time and was very impressed.Well located to city and Eastern suburbs.Staff very pleasant and obliging.Good buffet breakfast in restaurant.The pool area is wonderful with the best views.Loved my stay and will return.

review_body: Black bay cafe up the road good for breakfast. Rushcutters Bay very pleasant. Edge Cliff Station not far away - but Sydney has some painful hills ! Possible to walk from Hotel to City Centre on a cool day - Interesting sites on route, you have to be a bit fit to do that though !
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: A very satisfactory stay, we needed a quiet comfortable room to prepare for the next day in meetings all day, our room was clean and comfortable, everything worked (aircon, lights, blinds etc) the breakfast room service was exceptionally good, fast and courteous and made an outstanding start to our day.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: We always choose this hotel when going out in Sydney, easy access to all parts of Sydney and the Eastern suburbs, parking available under the hotel and great breakfast options. The staff are friendly and check in is quick.

3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: A very convenient location to the city and eastern suburbs, and just a two minute walk to the harbor edge - what a great place to stay and enjoy this side of the city. Highly recommend for a stay in Sydney
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Comfortable room and bed.....quiet at night.Pretty well located for waterfront. Pool and great view on roof.Breakfast was good.....reasonably priced.Will stay again when we return next year with more of the family.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Hotel is in a great location close to eateries, entertainment and public transport. Hotel Vibe has a nice eating and drinking area as well. The pool on the rooftop looks great and offers fantastic views of the city and Rushcutters bay.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: I liked very much the stroll to the park, the near city, the view from the room, the helpfull and nice people at the reception, the sitting in the bar, the dinner at the hotel and the wine. I liked very much the stay in the hotels like always in the last years.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: The Vibe Rushcutters Bay is a great place to stay if you need to be in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney. The amenities are very good and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff are always helpful and very friendly.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Well located well priced 4 star accommodation with little to fault. Staff were very approachable and friendly. Rooms were clean, beds comfortable and easy access to the adjoining park all made for a relaxing stay.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Hotel was fantastic in all regards. Service, location, innovations, car parking and food were all excellent! Check-in and out staff were very friendly and helpful. Parking was easy to access and plenty of spaces free. Great location right near the water and I loved the crowd dj channel on the tv where guests can pick the next song played...great bit of tech and a nice touch.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: It's hard to review this property because there are 3 different kinds of rooms:Type 1: facing the highwayType 2: looking into the space between the hotel and neighbour.Type 3: overlooking Rushcutters Bay park - very niceAll rooms are 4 - 5 star. Staff are polite and friendly. Nice bar with tasty snacks.It's between 2 railway stations - a 15 minute uphill walk either way.The park is the home to the Sydney Yacht Club (I think that's the name) and if you walk (or jog) further, there a beautiful views of the Opera House and Harbour Bridge.There's a small fitness centre and pool on the roof
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: I have stayed here a number of times and it always is great! Fabulous location on the park overlooking Rushcutters Bay and the boats at the CYC. The hotel has been upgraded and so have their breakfasts! Smashed Avocado with soft poached eggs with kale and cherry tomatoes, Yum! You can even bring your dog to dine on the deck overlooking the park!Rooms are always clean and housekeeping always happy to help. Beautiful pool ( I would love it a little warmer) and outlook over the water stunning!
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: We had a great Conference experience with good food on our breaks. We stayed over 2 days and the accommodation was comfortable and relaxing. The breakfast selection was amazing. We had a great dinner too on the first night.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: I had a lovely stay while in Sydney my room was clean. As I was staying on my own I felt secure and safe. Location was just near the bay so you could go on some lovely walks. Taxis were available at the door which was handy. Thank you for a wonderful stay.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

Rooms were good but visually are starting to wear with stain on carpets, chipped cupboards etc starting to show.Cleaner had vacuum going in corridor at 7.30am which i believe is a bit early for a hotel.Breakfast was ok but nothing special.Overall a fairly good value hotel.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Stayed at the Vibe for a work conference. Customer service was great, room was clean and well appointed and great location. When I called late at night for an extra blanket, it was immediately sent up. A small issue with aircon in our business room. However, they made amends at dinner with some free wine. Would recommend staying there.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Had a 2 night stay at the Vibe and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Staff were very friendly and nothing was too much trouble. Loved the pool and gym. Hotel is close to town and we walked the couple of km there and to restaurants in nearby Paddington. Only 20 minutes to airport too.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: The hotel is close to St Vincent's hospital. All ares appeared clean and well-cared for. The vat parkland near to the hotel is most enticing - a welcome nature-filled experience in the urban surroundings.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: Great place, nice rooms, kind and competent staff. Would highly recommend to anyone thinking of staying within close proximity to the city. Well appointed hotel with great amenities and a nice pool...
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney

review_body: The Vibe Hotel was a nice place to stay and is fairly centrally located in very fun spots in Sydney. The hotel staff was very nice and helpful. The room was very nice, clean, and modern. It had your basic amenities (e.g., soaps, shampoo, conditioner, lotion, teas, coffees, and a hot water kettle). There was also room service available and a pretty good looking restaurant downstairs. The hotel is pretty hip and had there been better weather, we probably would have hung out at the pool (it has a great view of the bay and park).
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love that I can walk after a working day, in great, green surrounds. The outside area is also a great retreat where you can wind down. The staff are friendly and the interiors are well appointed. My favorite area is the rooftop pool.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms clean and comfy, great showers and good on site bar service. Disappointed when room service knocked at 9am and woke us wanting to clean the room when we had an 11am check out. Carparking easy, although car park might be a little tight for a larger vehicle.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our tour company selected this hotel and we were pleasantly surprised. Quick walk to train station along restaurant lined streets. Very modern, beautiful views from rooftop and stunning pool deck. We highly recommend it!
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I choose the hotel for a stay during a business trip. The location of the hotel is very good; close to the park and a small harbour. The service at the hotel, however, during breakfeast and dinner was not good at all. Tables where dirty; was very difficult to get attention of staff.One of reasons why I choose the hotel was the roof top pool. During most of the stay, there was a problem with the pool so the pool was closed but also the roof top area where one could sit outside was closed. No apologies from the team when asking only blunt answer that there was a problem that needed fixing.Overall...not a hotel I would recommend.
hotelName:
3    Vibe Hotel Rushcutters Bay Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Been staying here ever since 19th and I never regret if choosing this hostel. Great place over and plenty of reason to love. Free walking tour, free cheese and wine, discounts, and many more for you to see. Also plenty of friendly staffs here, I met Maggie, Henrik, Maxime, and Marie and Rebecca. Awesome people but some room are not perfectly clean as it is dependent on the occupants which is understandable. Overall great place, highly recommend for anyone who’s here in Sydney. Thanks to the people mentioned above.
hotelName:
4    Wake Up! Sydney
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
